sentences: Informal consultations focusing on the operational aspects and distribution of CDM projects continued on Tuesday, based on a new draft text addressing, inter alia , transparency of the CDM Executive Board s decision making, accreditation of DOEs and application of financial penalties to non-complying DOEs.

The draft decision also considers the CDM s regional and sub-regional distribution, and includes text on: simplifying and streamlining the process and requirements; facilitating development of methodologies; and supporting identification and development of project design documents in certain countries and regions.
Discussions continued late into Tuesday night.
